name: Mending Tides
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Waves of restorative water rush out from you out to a 60 foot radius, healing 6d6 hit points on every creature you choose within range.

At the end of your next turn, the waves pull back to the original point where you cast the spell before vanishing, healing every creature you choose that is still in the area for 6d6 hit points.
empower: Choose one - radius increased to 90 feet, or healing increased to 8d6.
